definition: as much as possible/to the greatest extent
as much as possible/to the greatest extent
to use up/to exhaust/to end/to finish/to the utmost/exhausted/finished/to the limit (of sth)/all/entirely
to the greatest extent/(when used before a noun of location) furthest or extreme/to be within the limits of/to give priority to
capacity/quantity/amount/to estimate/abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word
to measure

sentences.english: Modify your diet to exclude or limit dairy products, alcohol, smoking or other stimulants.
sentences.chinese: 不吃或少吃乳制品，尽量不要接近烟酒或其他刺激物。

sentences.english: In order to construct harmonious society, it is necessary to try to decrease the recidivism rate.
sentences.chinese: 建设和谐社会，尽量降低重新犯罪率是必要的。

sentences.english: I would try to maximize my combat capability, as long as this process goes on," he said.
sentences.chinese: 只要这个过程还在继续，我就会尽量加大战斗能力。

sentences.english: Try to squeeze in the grocery trip in that intermediate time.
sentences.chinese: 尽量在此期间挤时间去购物。

sentences.english: Try to avoid sending large records to the front end to be transformed there.
sentences.chinese: 尽量避免发送大型记录到前端并在那里转换。

sentences.english: The diet is As It IS. Replacements are NOT recommended.
sentences.chinese: 餐单内食物请尽量不要以其他食物代替。

sentences.english: In other words, avoid the left side of the entire hole.
sentences.chinese: 总之，你应该尽量避开洞的整个左侧区域。

sentences.english: Try to pay attention as you eat and stop when you're full.
sentences.chinese: 请尽量注意你的饱足感，如果你觉得饱了就不要再吃。

sentences.english: The property right need to be very clearly and blench of the pawn of bank.
sentences.chinese: 房产产权清晰，尽量回避银行抵押物业。

sentences.english: Her job is keeping the lecture hall as clean as possible.
sentences.chinese: 她的工作是尽量使报告厅保持干净。

sentences.english: As far as possible need not chlorpromazine.
My basic game plan was to try and reduce the incoming light to the absolute minimum.
sentences.chinese: 我拍摄的基本计划是尽量的减少进光量。

sentences.english: The demonstration was carefully orchestrated to attract maximum publicity.
sentences.chinese: 该示威经过精心策画以尽量吸引公众注重。

sentences.english: Install the shades as close to the glass as possible.
sentences.chinese: 安装的时候，尽量把这种遮光窗户和玻璃安的紧一点。

sentences.english: Use of global variables should be minimized.
sentences.chinese: 尽量减少全局变量的使用。

sentences.english: First, shake out as much water as you can and dry it off with a paper towel.
sentences.chinese: 首先你要使劲的甩干它，然后用纸巾尽量吸干。

definition: as far as possible/to do one's utmost
best/(you) had better (do what we suggest)
to avert/to prevent/to avoid/to refrain from
don't!/must not
remember at all costs
in order to avoid/so as not to
to avoid as taboo/to avoid by all means
to take note of/to pay attention to
suitable/appropriate
to avoid/to evade/to keep away from
(so as) to avoid/to prevent/(just) in case
by no means
to propose/to suggest/to recommend/proposal/suggestion/recommendation/CL:個|个[ge4],點|点[dian3]
must/to need to/to be sure to
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
surname Ying
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
not suitable/inadvisable/inappropriate
